name: Innocent Demo
description: Innocent is a group project for BabJam! 2, centered around a demigod, the lover of a maternal goddess who has fallen out of power. Another goddess, this one with far darker intentions, has consumed the land, placing Innocence, the source of the other's power, in the clutches of her many minions and victims. The player will fight and kill to reclaim this lost Innocence, returning it to her beloved in exchange for the benefits of this goddess's newfound power.
